channel.title: MoneySkillTalk Blog
channel.description: Learn how to make the most of your money skill here.

item.title: "AI Art Challenge Contest 2025" hosted by the Ministry of Unification of the Republic of Korea
item.description: AI Art Challenge Contest 2025 hosted by the Ministry of Unification of the Republic of Korea
item.content:encoded:
AI Art Challenge Contest 2025 hosted by the Ministry of Unification of the Republic of Korea

Greetings.
We are pleased to announce the “AI Art Challenge Contest“ hosted by the Ministry of Unification of the Republic of Korea.

AI Art Challenge Contest (May 1, 2025 – May 31, 2025)

Express your dream of a unified Korea through an AI-generated four-panel comic!

This is a special opportunity to envision the future of a unified Korea using AI technology and your imagination.

Join the challenge now and creatively bring the dream of unification to life with AI.

◼︎ Theme : Create a four-panel comic using generative AI, choosing one of the following topics:

  • Imagining a future where reunification is the only path to meeting separated families
  • Imagining a future where reunification is the only path to new experiences

◼︎ Eligibility :

  • Anyone interested in a unified Korea — including Korean citizens and overseas Koreans

◼︎ Schedule :

  • Submission Period: May 1 (Thu) – May 31 (Sat), 2025 (until midnight)
  • Jury Evaluation: June 4 (Wed), 2025
  • First Public Voting (Japan): June 29 (Sun), 2025
  • Second Public Voting (TBD): Between September–October 2025
  • Award Ceremony: November 7 (Fri), 2025

◼︎ Awards :

  • Grand Prize (1 winner): KRW 500,000
  • Creative Prize (1 winner): KRW 200,000
  • Harmony Prize (3 winners): KRW 100,000 each

◼︎ How to Apply :

  • Submit the application via the official challenge website.

◼︎ Contact :

  • Art Challenge Operations Team: 2025auac@gmail.com

※ This contest is held in collaboration with the “Overseas Korean Unification Cultural Events” by the Office of International Cooperation.

item.title: How much do I think like a rich person?
item.description: How much do I think like a rich person?
item.content:encoded:
I asked a billionaire what separates the rich from the rest.

His answer?

“We play a game no one else knows exists.”

How much do I think like a rich person?

  1. The rich don’t work for money. They make money work for them.

  2. You trade hours for dollars. They trade dollars for assets.

  3. You chase income. They chase equity.

  4. You save to feel safe. They invest to get free.

  5. You see jobs as stability. They see them as a trap.

  6. You buy homes to live in. They buy homes to rent out.

  7. You fear debt. They weaponize it.

  8. You want comfort. They want control.

  9. You hope for retirement. They engineer it.

  10. You flaunt paychecks. They hide net worths.

  11. You ask “how much per hour?” They ask “how much equity?”

  12. You’re building a résumé. They’re building a company.

  13. You fear taxes. They study them.

  14. You pay full price. They negotiate everything.

  15. You scroll. They study.

  16. You chase trends. They buy infrastructure.

  17. You live for weekends. They own their time.

  18. You celebrate promotions. They celebrate distributions.

  19. You consume content. They create it.

  20. You look for sales. They look for scale.

  21. You save for vacations. They buy freedom.

  22. You lease liabilities. They build assets.

  23. You look rich. They are rich.

  24. You avoid risk. They manage it.

  25. You dream. They plan.

  26. You hope. They execute.

  27. You build habits of survival. They build systems for wealth.

  28. You work harder. They work smarter.

  29. You wait for approval. They buy access.

  30. You play not to lose. They play to win.

  31. You trust your employer. They trust contracts.

  32. You complain about bills. They automate income.

  33. You beg for time off. They take off whenever.

  34. You want rewards. They want returns.

  35. You invest after spending. They invest before spending.

  36. You buy now. They delay gratification.

  37. You count hours. They count leverage.

  38. You budget. They allocate.

  39. You trade effort. They trade equity.

  40. You sell your time. They sell outcomes.

  41. You spend on brands. They build them.

  42. You take pride in doing it alone. They build empires with teams.

  43. You ask for raises. They raise capital.

  44. You fear what others think. They fear being average.

  45. You want the spotlight. They want results.

  46. You blame the system. They study it.

  47. You seek luck. They build leverage.

  48. You chase approval. They chase scalability.

  49. You want praise. They want profit.

  50. You grind for today. They build for decades.

  51. You act rich. They think rich.

  52. You buy liabilities to feel good. They buy assets to never worry.

  53. You think money is scarce. They know money is printed daily.

  54. You look at prices. They look at returns.

item.title: How to Check and Download Your KakaoPay QR Code (for Receiving)
item.description: MoneySkillTalk introduces how to check and download your KakaoPay receiving QR code
item.content:encoded:
MoneySkillTalk introduces how to check and download your KakaoPay receiving QR code.

First, open the KakaoTalk mobile app, then go to the “More” menu and tap the “Scan” button at the top.

When the “Scan” screen appears, tap the “Receive” option at the bottom.

Once you tap “Receive,” your personal KakaoPay receiving QR code will be displayed.

Entering an amount is optional. If you enter an amount, a QR code with a fixed amount will be generated. If you leave it blank, a QR code allowing the sender to freely enter the amount will be automatically created.

To download the QR code image, tap the download icon below the code.

The KakaoPay Mobile Transfer Link Generator is an online service that allows you to easily generate a mobile transfer link using the downloaded QR code (for receiving).

By placing the generated link on your website or blog, customers can send payments to your KakaoPay account with a single click—no extra steps required.

KakaoPay Mobile Transfer Link Generator : Learn More
www.mkttalk.com/tools/kakaopay-link-generator/

If you have any questions about the service, feel free to contact us anytime via KakaoTalk!

item.title: Collection of WordPress Website Examples (USA/Europe/China/Japan/Korea/Vietnam, etc.)
item.description: MoneySkillTalk presents a curated collection of major recent examples and case studies of websites, online stores, blogs, and community sites built with WordPress, in the U.S., Europe, Japan, China, Korea, Vietnam, and other regions.
item.content:encoded:
• WordPress Website Showcase
  • Websites using WordPress in English
  • Websites using WordPress in Japan
  • Websites using WordPress in Korea
  • Websites using WordPress in China
  • Websites using WordPress in Vietnam
  • Easily Browse WordPress Website Examples

WordPress Website Showcase

If you’re planning to create a new website, homepage, online store, or community using WordPress—or looking to redesign your existing site — the first step is usually to seek inspiration or reference other sites.

But finding well-made WordPress websites can be tricky if you don’t know where to look.

That’s why MoneySkillTalk has curated and organized top WordPress website examples from around the world — USA, Europe, China, Japan, Korea, and more. (Continuously updated)

  • WordPress Sites Random Viewer - Instantly view random WordPress site examples worldwide

  • WordPress Analytics - A tool for analyzing hidden data such as themes, hosting, plugins, developers, and domains

item.title: Real-Time Ranking of Popular WordPress Themes & Latest Recommended Free/Paid Themes
item.description: This page introduces the real-time download/sales rankings and latest recommended WordPress themes (both free and paid). You can easily check the most downloaded and best-selling WordPress themes currently available.
item.content:encoded:
• Latest Popular WordPress Theme Rankings
  • 1. Real-time Download Rankings of Free WordPress Themes
  • 2. Real-time Sales Rankings of Paid WordPress Themes
  • 3. WordPress Sale Now
  • Conclusion

◼︎ Popular WordPress Theme Ranking Info

One of the biggest reasons WordPress has become the most used CMS for website creation worldwide is thanks to its thriving ecosystem of themes and plugins developed by a large community of programmers and web designers.

However, due to the overwhelming number of themes and plugins (with new ones constantly being released), it can be difficult to decide which to use.

That’s why MoneySkillTalk presents the real-time ranking of the most downloaded and best-selling themes. (This data updates live as the page loads.)

WordPress Analytics
  • Easily check WordPress usage and hidden site data (themes/plugins/hosting/provider) – WordPress Analytics

1. Free WordPress Theme Rankings

Most WordPress themes can be downloaded for free via the official WordPress repository (WordPress.org).

Date : --
  • Popular WordPress Themes – WordPress.org

2. Paid WordPress Theme Rankings

At Envato Market, one of the world’s largest digital marketplaces, you can easily find and buy high-quality premium themes.

Using data from Envato (e.g., weekly sales), you can quickly check the current ranking of popular paid themes.

Date : --
  • Latest Paid Theme Rankings – ThemeForest

3. WordPress Sale Now

WordPress Sale Now is a site where you can check currently discounted WordPress themes/plugins and top hosting services like Cloudways, Bluehost, SiteGround, DreamHost, and FastComet.

It’s a great resource for purchasing popular WordPress items at a lower price.

WordPress Sale Now : www.wpsalenow.com

◼︎ Conclusion

We hope MoneySkillTalk’s resources help you use WordPress more conveniently.

item.title: How to Advertise on the JapanTalk Korean Community Website
item.description: Most visitors to JapanTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in Japan, either short-term or long-term. If your product or service is related to Japan, you can run more targeted advertisements for this specific audience.
item.content:encoded:
JapanTalk is an online community for Koreans living in or interested in Japan, as well as foreigners who speak Korean.

It’s a space for sharing useful information and experiences needed for daily life in Japan. The community is mainly used by Korean students, expatriates, travelers, immigrants, and working holiday visa holders living in Japan.

  • Visit JapanTalk: https://www.japantalk.net/

Key Features of JapanTalk

  1. Sharing Information About Life in Japan

    • Visa, banking, mobile phone setup, transportation tips, etc.
    • Well-organized tips and guidance for newcomers settling in

  2. Region-Based Community

    • Sub-groups and boards for major cities like Tokyo, Osaka, Nagoya, Kyoto, Fukuoka, Sapporo, etc.
    • Active sharing of local info and meetups

  3. Study Abroad & Working Holiday Info

    • University admission, language programs, exchange programs, scholarships
    • Active discussions among students and sharing of WH experiences

  4. Marketplace & Job Board

    • Job postings from Korean companies, Korean restaurants, cafés, academies, etc.
    • Buy/sell used electronics, furniture, rooms, attraction tickets, and more

  5. Culture & Community Activities

    • Korean food, cultural events, K-culture updates
    • Stories about dating or marrying Japanese partners, and cultural exchange

How to Advertise on JapanTalk

Most visitors to JapanTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in Japan short-term or long-term.
If your product or service is related to Japan, you can run targeted advertisements for this audience.

In addition, all ad posts are optimized for search engines, ensuring effective exposure on Google, Naver, and more.

  • JapanTalk Advertising Info: https://www.japantalk.net/advertising/

For advertising inquiries, contact us via email ( hello@japantalk.net ) or KakaoTalk ( www.japantalk.net/kakao/ ).

item.title: How to Advertise on the ChinaTalk Korean Community Website
item.description: The main visitors to ChinaTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in China, either short-term or long-term. If your product or service is related to China, you can run more targeted advertisements toward this specific audience.
item.content:encoded:
ChinaTalk is an online community for Koreans living in or interested in China, as well as foreigners who speak Korean.

It’s a place to share useful information and experiences about life in China, actively used by Korean students, expatriates, travelers, and immigrants currently residing in China.

  • Visit ChinaTalk: https://www.chinatalk.net/

Key Features of ChinaTalk

  1. Sharing Information About Life in China

    • Visa, banking, mobile phone setup, transportation tips, etc.
    • Well-organized guides for those settling in China for the first time

  2. Region-Based Community

    • Sub-groups and boards for major cities like Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou, etc.
    • Active sharing of local information and meetups

  3. Study Abroad & Working Holiday Info

    • Info about Chinese universities, language programs, exchange programs, scholarships, etc.
    • Active discussions among students, including working holiday experiences

  4. Marketplace & Job Board

    • Job postings from Korean companies, restaurants, cafes, academies, etc.
    • Buy/sell second-hand electronics, furniture, rooms, attraction tickets, and more

  5. Culture & Community Activities

    • Korean food, cultural events, and K-culture news
    • Discussions about dating/marriage with Chinese partners and cultural differences

How to Advertise on ChinaTalk

Most visitors to ChinaTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in China, either short-term or long-term.
If your product or service is related to China, you can run targeted ads aimed at this audience.

In addition, all ad posts are SEO-optimized to be effectively exposed to search engines like Google and Naver.

  • ChinaTalk Advertising Information: https://www.chinatalk.net/advertising/

For inquiries about advertising, please contact us via email ( hello@chinatalk.net ) or KakaoTalk ( www.chinatalk.net/kakao/ ).

item.title: How to Advertise on the TaiwanTalk Korean Community Website
item.description: Most visitors to TaiwanTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in Taiwan, either short-term or long-term. If your product or service is related to Taiwan, you can run more targeted ads aimed at this specific audience.
item.content:encoded:
TaiwanTalk is an online community for Koreans living in or interested in Taiwan, as well as foreigners who speak Korean.

It’s a platform for sharing practical information and experiences related to life in Taiwan, actively used by Korean students, expatriates, travelers, immigrants, and working holiday visa holders currently residing in Taiwan.

  • Visit TaiwanTalk: https://www.taiwantalk.net/

Key Features of TaiwanTalk

  1. Sharing Information About Life in Taiwan

    • Visa, ARC (Alien Resident Certificate), health insurance, banking, mobile phone setup, transportation, etc.
    • Well-organized tips and guides for newcomers

  2. Region-Based Community

    • Local boards and groups for major cities like Taipei, Taichung, Kaohsiung
    • Active sharing of regional info and meetup posts

  3. Study Abroad & Working Holiday Info

    • University admissions, language study, exchange programs, scholarship opportunities
    • Active discussions among students and WH visa holders

  4. Marketplace & Job Board

    • Job listings from Korean businesses, restaurants, cafés, and academies
    • Buy/sell used electronics, furniture, housing, travel tickets, etc.

  5. Culture & Community Activities

    • Korean food, cultural events, Hallyu (K-culture) updates
    • Discussions on dating or marrying Taiwanese and cross-cultural communication

How to Advertise on TaiwanTalk

Most TaiwanTalk users are Koreans or Korean speakers living in Taiwan, either short-term or long-term.
If your product or service is related to Taiwan, you can run highly targeted ads to this specific audience.

All advertisement posts are optimized for search engines, allowing them to be effectively exposed via Google, Naver, and more.

  • TaiwanTalk Advertising Info: https://www.taiwantalk.net/advertising/

For advertising inquiries, contact us via email ( hello@globaltalk.asia ) or KakaoTalk ( www.taiwantalk.net/kakao/ ).

item.content:encoded:
VietnamTalk is an online community for Koreans living in or interested in Vietnam, as well as foreigners who speak Korean.

It’s a space to share useful information and experiences about life in Vietnam, actively used by Korean students, expatriates, travelers, and immigrants currently residing in the country.

  • Visit VietnamTalk: https://www.vietnamtalk.net/

Key Features of VietnamTalk

  1. Sharing Information About Life in Vietnam

    • Visa, banking, mobile phone setup, transportation, etc.
    • Well-organized tips and guides for those settling in

  2. Region-Based Community

    • City-specific groups and boards for Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Da Nang, Hue, Nha Trang, etc.
    • Active sharing of local information and meetups

  3. Study Abroad & Working Holiday Info

    • University admissions in Vietnam, language courses, exchange programs, scholarships
    • Lively communication among students, including WH experiences

  4. Marketplace & Job Board

    • Job postings from Korean companies, Korean restaurants, cafés, academies, etc.
    • Trade used electronics, furniture, rooms, attraction tickets, and more

  5. Culture & Community Activities

    • Korean food, cultural events, K-culture news
    • Stories about dating/marriage with Vietnamese partners, and cultural differences

How to Advertise on VietnamTalk

Most visitors to VietnamTalk are Koreans or Korean speakers living in Vietnam, either short-term or long-term.
If your product or service is related to Vietnam, you can run highly targeted ads aimed at this audience.

Additionally, ad posts are SEO-optimized to be effectively exposed on Google, Naver, and other search engines.

  • VietnamTalk Advertising Info: https://www.vietnamtalk.net/advertising/

For inquiries, contact us via email ( hello@vietnamtalk.net ) or KakaoTalk ( www.vietnamtalk.net/kakao/ ).
